entity.name: FOX News Sunday With Chris Wallace
entity.description: Journalist Chris Wallace moderates the Fox News political issues program, featuring interview with newsmakers of the day, focusing on the current topics and issues facing the country. The son of CBS newsman Mike Wallace, Chris Wallace also previously helmed the NBC weekend political show "Meet the Press."
